title: Maze☆Bakunetsu Jikuu (Maze: The Mega-Burst Space OVA)
synopsis: Maze has gained incredible powers traveling through time and space, but she has also acquired one rather large problem: every night she turns into a really horny man. Unfortunately, Maze must rescue an equally lascivious princess from a mysterious warrior cult. Still, the male version of Maze would rather be chasing tail than rescuing willing princesses.
voices: ['Seki, Tomokazu', 'Tange, Sakura', 'Nishimura, Chinami', 'Kobayashi, Yuko', 'Satou, Masaharu', 'Ishizuka, Unshou', 'Nishihara, Kumiko', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Okiayu, Ryoutarou']
staff: [['Suzuki, Iku', ['Director']], ['Mima, Masafumi', ['Sound Director']], ['Yamanaka, Norimasa', ['Theme Song Arrangement', ' Theme Song Composition']], ['Yoshinari, You', ['Key Animation', ' Character Design']]]
